title: Profile Info
alt: It's ok, they'll always let you opt out! Like they did with the YouTube real name profile thing.
transcript:
[Cueball is sitting at a desk, using a desktop computer. He is filling in a form on a webpage.]
First Name: John
Last Name: If-you-see-this-name-in-an-ad-give-the-product-a-one-star-review-Smith[Caption below the panel:]
How to deal with companies harvesting your profile for marketing
